body_html:
@orionr You are right, there is a system level old version caffe2. I don't have it in any env. any workaround?

[frank@node010 pytorch]$ find / -name Caffe2Config.cmake 2>/dev/null
/cm/shared/apps/caffe2/0.8.1/share/cmake/Caffe2/Caffe2Config.cmake
/home/frank/pytorch/build/Caffe2Config.cmake
